anime.name: Pokémon: Black and White
anime.info: Pokèmon Nero e Bianco: Avventure a Unima e Altrove
Pokémon Nero e Bianco: Destini Rivali
Pokémon: Black and White - Rivaliserende Lotsbestemmingen
Pokémon: Negro y Blanco - Destinos rivales
ポケットモンスター ベストウイッシュ

The journey of young Satoshi (Ash Ketchum) of Kanto continues as he arrives in the Isshu (Unova) region, still aiming to be a Pokémon Master; he and his partner Pikachu meet up with new comrades Iris and Dent (Cilan). As Satoshi challenges the Gyms of the Isshu region and battles new rivals, there is danger lurking behind the scenes as criminal syndicates Team Rocket and Team Plasma each have their own dark agendas for all the people and Pokémon who reside in Isshu.
#1: "Best Wishes!" (ベストウイッシュ！) by Rica Matsumoto (eps 1-84)
#1: "Black & White" by Erin Bowman & Joe Phillips (eps 1-48)
#2: "Rival Destinies" by Erin Bowman & Joe Phillips (eps 49-84)
#1: "Kokoro no Fanfare" (心のファンファーレ; "Fanfare of the Heart") by Aki Okui (eps 3-25)
#2: "Pokemon Ierukana? BW" (ポケモン言えるかな?BW; "Can You Name All the Pokémon? BW") by Takeshi Tsuruno (eps 26-60)
#3: "Nanairo Arch" (七色アーチ; "Seven-colored Arch") by Pokemon BW Gasshōdan [Aki Okui, Toshiko Ezaki, and Fumie Akiyoshi] (eps 61-78)
#4: "Look Look☆Here (みてみて☆こっちっち Mite Mite ☆Kotchitchi)" by Momoiro Clover Z (eps 79-84)
Pocket Monsters: Best Wishes! @ TV Tokyo
